code:
import axios from'axios';const API_BASE_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'http://localhost:8000';export const quickPhraseApi={// 자주쓰는 문장 목록 조회
async getQuickPhrases(){const response=await axios.get("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/quick_phrases"));return response.data;},// 자주쓰는 문장 생성
async createQuickPhrase(request){const response=await axios.post("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/quick_phrases"),request);return response.data;},// 자주쓰는 문장 삭제
async deleteQuickPhrase(phraseId){const response=await axios.delete("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/quick_phrases/").concat(phraseId));return response.data;},// 자주쓰는 문장 순서 변경
async updateQuickPhrasesOrder(phraseIds){const response=await axios.put("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/quick_phrases/order"),{phrase_ids:phraseIds});return response.data;}};
